Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of products that pass the inspection process.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Units Passed Inspection / Total Units Inspected) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The extent to which inspections are performed relative to the total number of items or batches.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Units Inspected / Total Units Produced) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of defects identified during the inspection process.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Defects Detected / Total Units Inspected) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The average cost incurred for inspecting each unit.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Total Inspection Cost / Total Units Inspected

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of corrective actions that are implemented as planned.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Corrective Actions Implemented / Total Corrective Actions) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to complete the inspection process from start to finish.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Total Inspection Time / Number of Units Inspected

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of products or processes that do not meet quality standards.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Non-Conforming Units / Total Units Produced) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of inspections that correctly identify defects or issues.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Correct Inspections / Total Inspections) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of the total test cases covered by the test process.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Test Cases Executed / Total Test Cases) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of test cases that pass successfully.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Tests Passed / Total Tests Conducted) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to complete a testing cycle.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Total Test Cycle Time / Number of Test Cycles

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of defects detected during the testing phase.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Defects Detected / Total Units Tested) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The average cost incurred for testing each unit.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Total Testing Cost / Total Units Tested

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The rate at which testing activities are completed.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Total Units Tested / Total Testing Time

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of tests that need to be retested.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Retests / Total Tests Conducted) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of test cases that are automated.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Automated Tests / Total Tests Conducted) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of planned audits that are completed.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Audits / Total Scheduled Audits) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of processes or products that meet regulatory and internal standards.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Instances / Total Instances) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The total number of instances where processes or products do not meet requirements.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Total Number of Non-Conformances

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of corrective actions that are successfully implemented.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Corrective Actions Implemented / Total Corrective Actions) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The classification of audit findings based on their impact and severity.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Total Severity of Audit Findings / Number of Audit Findings

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: How often audits are conducted within a specific period.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Number of Audits Conducted / Time Period

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The total time taken to complete an audit cycle.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Total Audit Cycle Time / Number of Audits Conducted

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The total costs associated with maintaining compliance with regulations and standards.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Total Cost of Compliance Activities

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The rate at which process improvements lead to better efficiency.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Process Efficiency After Improvements - Process Efficiency Before Improvements) / Process Efficiency Before Improvements * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The total financial savings achieved from process improvements.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Total Cost Savings from Process Improvements

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The reduction in the time required to complete a process or deliver a product.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Initial Lead Time - Final Lead Time) / Initial Lead Time * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The total time from the start to the end of a process.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: Total Process Cycle Time / Number of Cycles

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage reduction in the number of defects over a period.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: ((Defect Rate Before Improvement - Defect Rate After Improvement) / Defect Rate Before Improvement) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The level of employee involvement in suggesting and implementing process improvements.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Participating in Improvement Initiatives / Total Employees) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of processes that adhere to standardized procedures.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: (Number of Standardized Processes / Total Number of Processes) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.EXPLANATION: The reduction in time a process is unavailable due to issues or maintenance.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance.FORMULA: ((Downtime Before Improvement - Downtime After Improvement) / Downtime Before Improvement) * 100
